name: Crabby Crab
description:
Channel your inner crab in this retro arcade game!

  • Jump, grab and pull down medusas and fishes to the bottom.
  • Play in solo mode or compete against your friends in the Local 2 Player mode.
  • The longer you hold the jump button, the higher you go!
  • Original soundtrack (2 tunes)

Player 1 Controls

  • W - Jump
  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right

Player 2 Controls

  • Up arrow - Jump
  • Left arrow - Move Left
  • Right arrow - Move Right

Score table

  • Seaweed - 0
  • Medusa - 50
  • Yellow Fish - 100
  • Blue Fish - 1000

Made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 2022
